concept.title: Ease of management
concept.shortdesc: The solution has been designed for ease of management.

section.title: Delegation of administrative rights
section.p: Rather than relying on a single cluster administrator for your deployment, you can now delegate administrative rights within to trusted people throughout your organization. With fine-grained control, you can easily establish limits for administrators to slowly gain more responsibility throughout the system. By enabling project managers and business owners to control their own workloads and resource allocation policies, users enjoy better service and the burden on cluster administrators is substantially reduced.

An administrator can delegate specific sub-sets of rights to sub-administrators, with the ability to manage other users within their domain or to project owners with limited control over data resources within their domain.

section.title: Live customization
section.p: Administrators can quickly and easily make changes to a wide range of system parameters and reporting definitions and they can do so at any time “on the fly” without the need to restart cluster daemons. This means that you no longer have to wait for scheduled maintenance periods to make configuration changes to your cluster resources. This “live” reconfiguration capability boosts productivity, and minimizes downtime while reacting more swiftly to changing business priorities.
